text: 15.7 Luk 5.32 Anɨb ak tek God chɨnop gup agak. Bɨ olap tap si tap tɨmel gup okok kelɨgɨl God nop gos nɨgɨnɨgab ak, God man ne alaŋ mɨñmɨñ awl yɨbɨl gɨnɨgabal agak. Binɨb kuŋay teplep yɨbɨl mɨdeb okok, God ne kɨlop nɨŋɨd mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgab ak pen, bɨ olap tap si tap tɨmel gup okok kelɨgɨnɨgab ak, mɨñmɨñ awl yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab agak.
